page.title: 12Domesday in Cornholme
page.content: This particular section has been completed by Class 5 of Cornholme Junior, Infant and Nursery School. The co-ordinator was Mr Michael Maris, class teacher and deputy head of the school. The photographs were taken by Miss Ann Davies, class teacher and the children involved were Lorraine Wheeler : Craig Booth : Diane Fosbrook : Robert Gill : Casey Dyer : Melanie Broderick : Jackie Holden : Terrie Gilligan : Ronald Daly : Kevin Hartley : Abby Collinge : Belinda Hulme : Dawn Sawden : Melanie Davies : Patrick Glasby-Baldwin : Andrew Kirk : Mark Hartley : John Chaffer : Daniel Wilkinson : Chris Hargreaves : Keeley Walker : Katrina Cranley : Rachel Brooks : Daniel Croft : Daniel Greenman : Robert Sutcliffe : Steven Ripley : Gavin Cox : Stuart Horsfall :
